data.title: Fraunces Tavern Museum
data.meta_description:
Fraunces Tavern Museum is a survivor of the early days of New York City. 



The museum complex includes four 19th century buildings in addition to the 18th century Fraunces Tavern building. 



Admission:

Adults- $4

Seniors- $3

Children (6-18)- $3

Members and children under 6- Free
data.text:
Photo: Cititour.com

Neighborhood: Financial District

Type of Place: Museums

Description:

Fraunces Tavern Museum is a survivor of the early days of New York City.

The museum complex includes four 19th century buildings in addition to the 18th century Fraunces Tavern building.

Admission:

Adults- $4

Seniors- $3

Children (6-18)- $3

Members and children under 6- Free

Fraunces Tavern Museum

54 Pearl Street

New York, NY 10004

212-425-1778

Email

Website

Map
